duties_responsibilities.duty: Successfully manage and support clients and new business as the day-to-day main point of contact.
Measure clients' advertising campaign success and ROI through actionable insights data-driven storytelling.
Identify opportunities for additional revenue with prospective accounts.
Build positive business relationships with clients through proactive support, on-site visits, and client education/training.
Ensure client goals are met through proactive management and optimization.
Act as a liaison between multiple internal teams (Operations, Product, Marketing, Sales) to ensure successful setup and maintenance of accounts.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business, Marketing, or a related field (Master's preferred)
